price: 41.Wonna hinnay isin sin yibbixe gibdaabini fayya siinik iyyamkeh sin gine Rabbi kallactaanaah usuk kaa kah kallacteenim faxek fayya siinik haa, too waqdi isin sinni numtinwellittey Yallat Agleh haytaana cabtaanaah tet hawwentaanah.
arabic: بَلۡ إِيَّاهُ تَدۡعُونَ فَيَكۡشِفُ مَا تَدۡعُونَ إِلَيۡهِ إِن شَآءَ وَتَنسَوۡنَ مَا تُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: bal iyyāhu tadʿūna fayakshifu mā tadʿūna ilayhi in shāa watansawna mā tush'rikūna
